body.p: Consequently, the IASB amended paragraph 2(a) of IFRS 3 to:

li.p: exclude the formation of all types of joint arrangements from the scope of IFRS 3 by replacing ‘joint venture’ with ‘joint arrangement’; and
clarify that the only scope exclusion needed from the scope of IFRS 3 is the accounting for the formation of a joint arrangement in the financial statements of the joint arrangement itself.
